img.alt: Still Time to Order Your Yearbook

a.span: Still Time to Order Your Yearbook

div.p: Yearbook ordering has been extended due to the disruption in our school year, so you can still go to www.jostens.com and order your own copy, complete with a COVID-19 supplement to commemorate these crazy times.

a.title: Go to comments for Still Time to Order Your Yearbook

div.p: In response to the recent Executive Order by New Hampshire Governor Chris Sununu to continue remote instruction in New Hampshire schools throughout the remainder of the school year, the NHIAA Council has made the difficult decision to cancel the 2020 spring sports season and championships.

a.title: Go to comments for NHIAA Cancels All Spring Sports

img.alt: Vermont Virtual Young Writer's Conference Scheduled for June

a.span: Vermont Virtual Young Writer's Conference Scheduled for June

div.p: The Vermont Young Writer's Conference will be held virtually June 25-28. The deadline for acceptance has been extended to May 14.

a.title: Go to comments for Vermont Virtual Young Writer's Conference Scheduled for June

div.p: Due to the Governors mandate to extend online learning through the beginning of May, the NHIAA Executive Council has modified the start date of spring sports.

a.title: Go to comments for NHIAA UPDATE FOR SPRING SPORTS

img.alt: Souhegan High School Online Learning Information

a.span: Souhegan High School Online Learning Information

div.p: As you know, Governor Sununu has required schools to move to a remote learning platform through at least April 3. At Souhegan High School, we will be using online learning technologies for instruction and support. Last week, Souhegan staff engaged in professional development on both online education technology tools and instructional strategies. Last Friday, teachers shared their online learning plans with students. This document provides information and guidance on the structures and processes Souhegan High School will be using during our period of remote learning.

a.title: Go to comments for Souhegan High School Online Learning Information

div.p: Whether you are applying to a 2 or 4 year college there are a wide variety of opportunities available so please review them carefully to see which ones apply to you.

a.title: Go to comments for Local Scholarships Available

img.alt: Spotlight on Learning: Personalized Learning through in-the-moment Coaching

a.span: Spotlight on Learning: Personalized Learning through in-the-moment Coaching

div.p: How does my biology become my biography? Students in Jess Tremblays Understanding Psychology class recently explored this question as part of the unit that examines the relationship between human sensation and perceptions.

a.title: Go to comments for Spotlight on Learning: Personalized Learning through in-the-moment Coaching

img.alt: Spotlight on Learning: Souhegan Students Present Case Studies on Fictional Children in Literature

a.span: Spotlight on Learning: Souhegan Students Present Case Studies on Fictional Children in Literature

div.p: As part of a recent senior English project students conducted a study of human character that combines literature and psychology to explore the question, How do fictional children reflect or diverge from established child development theories?

a.title: Go to comments for Spotlight on Learning: Souhegan Students Present Case Studies on Fictional Children in Literature

img.alt: SOUHEGAN HIGH SCHOOL SCORES AT TOP OF GLOBAL RANKINGS

a.span: SOUHEGAN HIGH SCHOOL SCORES AT TOP OF GLOBAL RANKINGS

div.p: Souhegan/SAU #39 students on par with Singapore and Hong Kong in high school Reading, Math, and Science performance

a.title: Go to comments for SOUHEGAN HIGH SCHOOL SCORES AT TOP OF GLOBAL RANKINGS

img.alt: SHS Highly Commended by Accreditation Organization

a.span: SHS Highly Commended by Accreditation Organization

div.p: The New England Association of Schools and Colleges (NEASC) informed Souhegan High School of its renewed accreditation for the next ten years and highlighted 18 commendations in the standards for accreditation from the many written in the report, according to NEASC Director, George Edwards, in a recent letter to the school.

a.title: Go to comments for SHS Highly Commended by Accreditation Organization

div.p: Click here for the Decennial Report for Souhegan High School from the New England Association of Schools & Colleges, Inc.

a.title: Go to comments for NEASC Decennial Report
